id: ✨ Free Life OS – All-in-One Notion Template
name: ✨ Free Life OS – All-in-One Notion Template
description: Simplify your life with one single Notion dashboard – totally free & fully copy-paste ready!The Free Life OS is your minimal yet powerful life planner built entirely inside Notion. Whether you're a student, creative, entrepreneur, or just someone who loves being organized – this template helps you manage your daily life, goals, habits, wellness, and more, all in one place.Designed for instant copy-paste use (no Notion duplication needed), it’s perfect if you want a clean, aesthetic dashboard
features: Top 3 Tasks of the Day; Time-Blocked Daily Planner; Morning Mindset Journal; Night Reflection Check-In; Weekly Goals Section; Task List & Quick Notes; Weekly Reflection Prompts; Daily Habits Table (Manual Tracker); Meal Log (Breakfast / Lunch / Dinner); Mood + Sleep Check
